article_title: Obamacare Cadillac Tax Is No Rolls Royce. New IRS Guidance Makes It A Lemon

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: The Affordable Care Act's Cadillac tax slaps a 40% excise tax on companies that provide health insurance that is too good. It is in the law, so debating its fairness is moot. Yet administering the tax will be like untying a Gordian Knot, as the first IRS guidance reveals.
og.title: Obamacare Cadillac Tax Is No Rolls Royce. New IRS Guidance Makes It A Lemon
